head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LOWE, JEANETTE MARMOTT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LOWE, JEANETTE MARMOTT

block.p: LOWE-Jeanette Marmott. With heavy hearts and profound sadness we mourn the loss of Jeanette Marmott Lowe (Beauty), October 8, 2000. Precious mother of Gail Lowe Maidman (Richard), devoted grandmother of Starr Elizabeth Haymes and Evan Adam Haymes, sister of Perry Zitter, Edith Bloch and the late Ernest Marmott, daughter of the late Louis George and Esther (Blumenthal) Marmott. We will miss our Beauty and the tender, loving, kindness she showed us. Services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel at 11:15 AM, Wednesday, October 11, 180 West 76th Street (Amsterdam Avenue). Shiva at Gail's home, from 11AM to 1PM and 4PM to 7PM commencing after services at 4PM, October 11. Contributions may be made to the charity of your choice.
